code: class  Solution  {   public :   string  maximumBinaryString ( string  binary )  {           const  int  zeros  =  ranges :: count ( binary ,  '0' );   const  int  prefixOnes  =  binary . find ( '0' );     binary . assign ( binary . length (),  '1' );     if  ( prefixOnes  !=  string :: npos )   binary [ prefixOnes  +  zeros  -  1 ]  =  '0' ;   return  binary ;   }  };
